title: CKA exam prep, part 1

content:
You could have been anywhere in the world. So thank you for checking out my blog.

About Me

Professionally I’m a mix of Platfrom Engineer, Senior Software Engineer, DevOps, and a 10-year US Air Force veteran. Oh, Blockbuster Video? Yep, worked there too, no biggie.

I grew up in the SF Bay Area skateboarding where a fantastic artist drew the above image from a picture of me, by hand no less.

Blog Content

It might turn out polished and nice. But for now this is where I’ll share my quick notes to the void and any deep dives into tech stacks, frameworks, tools, and better practices.
